relevant_findings.HEENT: Sclera anicteric, Dry MM, oropharynx clear, EOMI, PERRL
relevant_findings.neck: Supple, JVP not elevated, no LAD
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, normal S1 + S2, no murmurs, rubs, gallops
relevant_findings.lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rales, rhonchi
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, mildly-tender on bilateral upper quadrants, non-distended, bowel sounds present, no organomegaly, no rebound or guarding
relevant_findings.neurological: CN II-XII intact, strength upper/lower extremities grossly normal, sensation normal, 2+ reflexes bilaterally, gait deferred
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well perfused, 2+ pulses, no clubbing, cyanosis or edema

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Decreased pain reported upon arrival to the floor.

relevant_findings.imaging: CT abdomen revealed mild pancreatic swelling without focal suspicious lesions, slightly dilated CBD but stable; diverticulosis of sigmoid colon without wall thickening.
